articles.description: Nobel winner Kazuo Ishiguro returns with Klara And The Sun, another novel of yearning and alienation; Hanif Abudrraqib pens Notes In Praise Of Black Performance; and more in March.
articles.content: Every month, a deluge of new books comes flooding out from big publishers, indie houses, and self-publishing platforms. So every month, The A.V. Club narrows down the endless options to five of the b… [+7009 chars]
